ds_id: Mark Zuckerberg's MMA trainer 'not sure' Meta CEO would beat Elon Musk@Business Insider@2023-06-25 15:34:30.700118@Meta
data_content: Elon Musk has challenged Meta CEO, Mark Zuckerberg to a cage fight. Although Zuckerberg, who has been training in mixed martial arts, seemed to accept the challenge, his trainer, Khai Wu, expressed uncertainty about the outcome, stating that while Zuckerberg trains hard, the fight outcome cannot be predicted. The head of UFC, Dana White, said both billionaires are serious about the face-off. Elon Musk admitted that he hasn't started training yet but believes the fight may actually happen.
